title: Return to Mr. Thorne
description: Professional organizer Lexie Ross refuses to take Mr. Thorne's call, so he invites her to dinner.They meet in a private room, in complete darkness, because the restaurant's theme is dining in the dark. It's supposed to be a sensual experience, all about the food. All about the senses.The appetizers haven't even arrived, and already Mr. Thorne is making some rather forceful demands.* * Erotic short story. Adult 18+ readers only * *Part of a 5-story series.
author: Mimi Strong
